title: Shivers
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger joint in East Millcreek area. Four vegetarian patties offered: garden, chipotle black bean, boca, and veggie. Veggie patty is only vegan option. Vegans to specify "no pink sauce" but can substitute ketchup and mustard. Patties are cooked on same grill as meat but on a separate section. Patties can be ordered as wraps.
